 2022-06502022-06-10,  ,  ,  ESDC,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the definitions of permanent disability and severe permanent disability; (2) add a new definition for persistent or prolonged disability; (3) amend the definitions of full-time student and part-time student; and (4) expand access to disability supports offered by the Canada Student Financial Assistance Program for students with a persistent or prolonged disability.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0131 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment
